useOutdated.title: Use Outdated
useOutdated.description: whether or not outdated reads are OK

timeFormat.title: Time Format
timeFormat.description: what format to return times in (default: `'native'`). Set this to `'raw'` if you want times returned as JSON objects for exporting.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: whether or not to return a profile of the query's execution.

result.title: Result
result.description: A single JSON result, or a cursor, depending on the query
